_aChangeLog.text: Fixed a bug there a trigger wouldn't teleport you back

_sText:
Hello!

This is my second map! (Let's say first since the first one was me fooling around with brushes and entities). I did my best to try and make a decent bhop map which I think I partially succeeded at but there's still lots of improvements to be done and I'd like your feedback to get there!

The map consists of 3 stages where 2 are really short and the third is just above the short timespand in which I did the map in about a minute and thirty seconds, give it a try and let me know what I can improve on :')
